resources.string: Use the same favorites on all devices. Leave off to keep mobile and desktop favorites separate.

Sync Paused
You've reached the maximum number of bookmarks. Please delete some to resume sync.

Manage Bookmarks
Bookmark Sync is Paused\nYou\'ve reached the maximum number of bookmarks. Please delete some bookmarks to resume sync.

Sync Paused
Some bookmarks are formatted incorrectly or too long and were not synced.

Manage Bookmarks
Bookmark Sync is Paused\nSome bookmarks are formatted incorrectly or too long and were not synced.

plurals.name: saved_site_invalid_items_warning
plurals.instruction: %1$ represents a site name or url, %2$d is the number of other invalid sites
plurals.item: Your bookmark for %1$s can’t sync because one of its fields exceeds the character limit.\n\n
Your bookmarks for %1$s and %2$d other sites can’t sync because some of their fields exceed the character limit.\n\n
